traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The krasis can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
